name: Escape from Marble Tower
description:
Our agent, Space-Man, foiled by the wizard he was tasked to apprehend, is now trapped in a time looping Marble Tower. 

Guide Space-Man downward through the eight rearranging floors of the Tower while collecting treasure, unlocking abilities, and overcoming threats left behind by the fugitive Wizard.

Please do try to collect treasure. Our budget is in crisis. 

But beware the curse of the Marble Man's touch. It affects the Tower's ability to summon enemies. In time you will overcome the Unstoppable Marble Man, as you...

ESCAPE FROM MARBLE TOWER!  

-- W.H.U. Command

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys:

Move or vault Space-Man

or 

Attack adjacent tile

Space:

Enter Vault Mode

When next to a pillar, legal vault spaces will be highlighted. 

Press the arrow key toward a highlighted space to vault two spaces. 

Pressing Space again or pressing an arrow key toward a non highlighted space will exit vault mode. 

B:

Ready bomb. The bomb will be placed on the next pillar you vault over. 

B again to disarm. 

ESC:

Pause

Q:

Quit Game

(while paused)

Special Thanks to Jeremiah Reid’s JavaScript Broughlike tutorial. It practically taught me to code! Then I spent some months learning Unity by applying what I could from the tutorial, fumbling through a lot of Unity specific stuff,  and designing a bit of my own gameplay when I could find the time :)
